subject: Get to know Seguno: let's get started (1/6)
description_text:
hello and welcome! 
 we founded Seguno with a mission— to build better marketing tools for Shopify merchants. 
 



 
 [Image "seguno-welcome-1.jpg?expires=1775078550&signature=ec80d4b230b8c3c593510a31bcd2df827fdd60e346c3b5a7e0ca797402110fe8&req=dSMkFch5mIVWW%2FMW2XS%2Fib4HApRp8KN93w9VsYODiaOUwRbMJLk%3D%0A"] 
 



 
 Over the next few emails, we’re going to share tips, tutorials, and key features to help you get the most out of Seguno. As you try it out, know that our Support team is always available at support@seguno.com. 
 



 
 Get to know Seguno
